metadata.name: Set Suspicious Files as System Files Using Attrib.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the usage of attrib with the "+s" option to set scripts or executables located in suspicious locations as system files to hide them from users and make them unable to be deleted with simple rights. The rule limits the search to specific extensions and directories to avoid FPs

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\attrib.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('attrib.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' +s')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' %')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\programdata\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\downloads\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\temp\\'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.hta')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbs'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\temp\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the usage of attrib with the "+s" option to set scripts or executables located in suspicious locations as system files to hide them from users and make them unable to be deleted with simple rights. The rule limits the search to specific extensions and directories to avoid FPs
